name: Subsist Baddies
description:
Subsist Baddies is a fast pace platformer shooter,
survive the baddies through 10 waves.

Use wasd to move and jump, mouse to shoot, z to toggle auto fire, space to skip menus, shift to pause and start.
To use a gamepad, after clicking start, press one of the directional buttons on your gamepad then follow the on screen prompts.
Have Fun!
